name: health-check
description: Check the health status of all running services
instructions:
Check if all Aura services are running and healthy.

1. Check if Docker services are running: docker compose ps
2. Test server health: curl -f http://localhost:8000/health
3. Test agent health: curl -f http://localhost:8001/health
4. Test UI availability: curl -f http://localhost:5173/
5. Check Redis: docker compose exec redis redis-cli ping
6. Provide a summary dashboard showing:
   - ✅ or ❌ for each service
   - Port numbers and URLs
   - Any error messages
   - Suggestions if services are down (e.g., 'Run make dev to start services')
